      • toMillis

        public static long toMillis​(float nTime,
                            char cSuffix)
        Returns the amount of milliseconds.

        Note: 5.5 days is allowed. 5.5 hours is wired but it is user's responsibility.

        Parameters:
        nTime - Time to convert.
        cSuffix - u | t | s | m | h | d
        Returns:
        The amount of milliseconds.

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber​(java.lang.String str)

        Checks whether the given String is a parsable number.

        Parsable numbers include those Strings understood by Integer.parseInt(String), Long.parseLong(String), Float.parseFloat(String) or Double.parseDouble(String). This method can be used instead of catching ParseException when calling one of those methods.

        Hexadecimal and scientific notations are not considered parsable. See #isCreatable(String) on those cases.

        Null and empty String will return false.

        CREDITS: taken from Apache NumberUtils

        Parameters:
        str - the String to check.
        Returns:
        true if the string is a parsable number.

      • isChar4Name

      • buildMacro

        public static java.lang.String buildMacro​(java.lang.String s)

      • getMacroFrame

        public static int[] getMacroFrame​(java.lang.String str)
        Returns the first macro found in passed string: A 2 items array: being the first one the start index inside passed string and the second one the end index.
        If received string has no macro, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        str - String to search for macro.
        Returns:
        A 2 items array with the start index and the end index of the macro, or null if there is no macro.
